entry.title: [WAW1][Dedicated Servers] - Room W12 W14 W16
entry.content:
Jun 16, 20:45 UTC
Monitoring - All the services are currently operational.
We are still running on our backup equipment.
In the meantime, we are still working to restore the service as nominal

Jun 16, 19:29 UTC
Identified - Update : Services are in the process of being restored. Our backup equipments is ensuring continuity of service.
Our teams are working to resolve the situation definitively.

Jun 16, 17:42 UTC

entry.title: [Global][Network] - vRack Issues
entry.content:
Jun 15, 14:34 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 13/06/2023 08:10 UTC
End Time : 15/06/2023 14:11 UTC
Service impacted : The code did not configure the doq1q tunnel mode on the vrack interface, which affected vrack communication for clients using tagged vlans.
Root cause : Incident due to a regression following a code modification.
Workaround : To fix the problem, you can remove the server from its vrack and add it again.
Our teams are working on a script so that the workaround is carried out automatically for all the servers concerned.
